scope.title: Progress Indicator
scope.description: Progress indicators provide visual feedback to users to let them know and understand their current context at any given time and be assured that they are progressing through the system.

data.title: Progress Indicator
data.description: Progress indicators provide visual feedback to users to let them know and understand their current context at any given time and be assured that they are progressing through the system.
